abstract: South Africa's North-West University is forced to close after student protests turn violent.
lead_paragraph: North-West University said the protesting students burned an administration building and science center at the campus in Mafikeng on Wednesday night.

headline.main: South Africa: Student Protesters Force Their University to Close
headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: Student Protesters Force Their University to Close

snippet: North-West University said the protesting students burned an administration building and science center at the campus in Mafikeng on Wednesday night.
